turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: hello, how can i assist you?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Hi, I'd like to order a beverage from Stabucks.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: sure. what kind of coffee would you like?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I'm looking a cafe latte a grande with soy milk.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: so i have a grande latte with soy milk, is that correct?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: where would you like to pick it up?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Looking to pick it up at Starbucks on Walnut Street in Philadelphia.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: ok, your coffee will be ready for pickup soon at the starbucks store on walnut street.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: you're welcome. your receipt will be sent to you via text message.
